blogPost.excerpt: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
blogPost.body: gSweets slash commands save you time, and keep you in a state of flow. Our first batch of shortcuts let you format text, add screenshots, and search emojis, GIFs, and stock photos. Add it to Chrome for free today. Designed to be 100% private.
blogPost.title: gSweets - Save time in Google Docs with Notion-like shortcuts
blogPost.author: Robleh Jama

localize.description: gSwets劈开命令可以节省您的时间，并让您保持流畅的状态。我们的第一批快捷方式可以让你格式化文本、添加截图、搜索表情符号、GIF和库存照片。今天就把它免费添加到Chrome中吧。设计成100%私密的。
localize.tagline: 使用类似概念的快捷方式在Google Docs中节省时间

localize.description: gSwets劈開命令可以節省您的時間，並讓您保持流暢的狀態。我們的第一批快捷方式可以讓你格式化文本、添加截圖、搜索表情符號、GIF和庫存照片。今天就把它免費添加到Chrome中吧。設計成100%私密的。
localize.tagline: 使用類似概念的快捷方式在Google Docs中節省時間

previous.excerpt: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life — all over email. ⠀ Get started at letterloop.co
previous.title: Letterloop - Create group newsletters with friends and family. ✍️

localize.description: Letterloop允许您与朋友和家人创建私人群组时事通讯。与生活中最重要的人保持联系，拉近距离，通过电子邮件发现你从来不知道的事情。⠀入门网址为letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 与朋友和家人一起创建群组时事通讯。✍️

localize.description: Letterloop允許您與朋友和家人創建私人羣組時事通訊。與生活中最重要的人保持聯繫，拉近距離，通過電子郵件發現你從來不知道的事情。⠀入門網址爲letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 與朋友和家人一起創建羣組時事通訊。✍️

next.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.
next.title: PC Builder - Custom PC part picker tool to build your PC

localize.description: PC Builder是一个网站，帮助人们创建兼容的PC部件列表，而不会遇到任何兼容性问题。这个网站是以初学者为中心创建的，其主要目标是让每个人都能轻松兼容。
localize.tagline: 用于构建PC的自定义PC部件选取器工具

localize.description: PC Builder是一個網站，幫助人們創建兼容的PC部件列表，而不會遇到任何兼容性問題。這個網站是以初學者爲中心創建的，其主要目標是讓每個人都能輕鬆兼容。
localize.tagline: 用於構建PC的自定義PC部件選取器工具
